description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using LightningJS framework, including its template, state, and input handler.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Defines the HTML structure of the Button component, with dynamic content based on component state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component state with variables isFavorited, favoriteText, and unfavoriteText.

methods.name: input
methods.description: Defines input handlers, specifically toggling 'isFavorited' on 'enter' event.
